segments.text: Gosh , another stop.It seems the cars ahead of us have to stop every two minutes , It's no quicker than a bus .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's true . During rush hours , taxis are just as quick as buses .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It was silly of me to have taken a taxi .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: At least , it can free you from the crowd . By the way , do you come from China ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , from New Zealand , sir . I visited New Zealand and saw lots of overseas people there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow , like America . It receives a great number of visitors every year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The more the world becomes open , the more people become international !
segments.speaker: S1
